definition: precisely accurate or exact, a tense of verbs used in describing action that has been completed (sometimes regarded as perfective aspect), make perfect or complete
details:
adjective
- precisely accurate or exact
= example: precisely accurate or exact
- being complete of its kind and without defect or blemish
= example: being complete of its kind and without defect or blemish
- without qualification
= synonyms: stark
noun
- a tense of verbs used in describing action that has been completed (sometimes regarded as perfective aspect)
= synonyms: perfective tense, perfect tense, perfective
verb
- make perfect or complete
= example: make perfect or complete
= synonyms: hone
